column4: when inserting a USB pen, it can't be mounted: apparently only root can. How can this be fixed?

i had a issue where the fstab file had an extra/wrong entry for a cdrom drive  - it wouldent auto mount /dev/sda1 thumb drives automatically because of that.. check the fstab may be a good starting point
it did this - i think because i installed from a thumbdrive/unetbootin installed drive
